name: Bellatrix: Tales of Orionis
summary: Bellatrix: Tales of Orionis is an episode of 11 vanilla maps compatible. You wake up next to your survival pod, not knowing what planet you’re on. You don’t remember anything, and a version of yourself remained in hyper hibernation. By tapping on the control screens, you quickly understand that you are on a planet that was part of the former colonization of the UAC, Orionis. You then decide to take the path to the nearest town, but the inhabitants of the surrounding area seem hostile.
